abstract: Hershey edged closer to a bid for Cadbury of Britain on Friday, people briefed on the matter told DealBook, just days before Kraft is set to disclose its final offer for the confectioner.
snippet: Hershey edged closer to a bid for Cadbury of Britain on Friday, people briefed on the matter told DealBook, just days before Kraft is set to disclose its final offer for the confectioner.
lead_paragraph: Hershey edged closer to a bid for Cadbury of Britain on Friday, people briefed on the matter told DealBook, just days before Kraft is set to disclose its final offer for the confectioner.

headline.main: Hershey Moves Closer to Making Cadbury Bid

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la Merced
